text:

o Provide gentle, supportive care and conduct the IOL in a location separate from women with live fetuses.
o Ensure companionship for as long as the woman wants.
o Consider referral after discharge to mental health support services - see mental health chapter.
IOL after prolonged ROM at term 
• For ROM >16 hours, antibiotic cover should be instituted.
• IOL can follow the usual protocol.
• Studies have indicated that that Foley catheter IOL may be used safely with ruptured membran
